visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include monthly temperature data for a year. Additionally, specify custom colors for the chart and configure other settings such as chart margins, background, and legend.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and the background color is light gray (#f9f9f9). The chart has custom margins to ensure proper spacing around the chart area. The title and axis labels are styled with specific colors and font sizes to enhance readability. The x-axis represents the months of the year, and the y-axis represents the temperature in degrees Celsius. The data series includes monthly temperature data for a year, with the series name set to 'Temperature' and the color of the series set to a tomato red (#FF6347). The legend is enabled and styled to match the overall theme of the chart. This configuration ensures a visually appealing and informative chart presentation.
